content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the value, if any, of vertical farms to the future of agriculture.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the value, if any, of vertical farms to the future of agriculture.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
